channel.title: Artsy Engineering Radio
channel.itunes:author: Artsy Engineering
channel.description: A podcast exploring questions in software engineering.

item.itunes:title: 19: Humanizing The Workplace
item.title: 19: Humanizing The Workplace
item.description: Steve Hicks and Justin Bennett talk about empathy in workplace culture, how to build trust and safety, and the importance of providing space for people.
item.content:encoded: Steve Hicks and Justin Bennett talk about empathy in workplace culture, how to build trust and safety, and the importance of providing space for people.
item.itunes:author: Steve Hicks & Justin Bennett. Edited by Aja Simpson
item.itunes:keywords: engineering, software engineering, software development, open source

item.itunes:title: 18: Software Accessibility
item.title: 18: Software Accessibility
item.description: Join Tricia and Damon as they discuss how they design and build software with accessibility in mind.
item.content:encoded: Join Tricia and Damon as they discuss how they design and build software with accessibility in mind.
item.itunes:author: Tricia Ofuono & Damon Z. Edited by Aja Simpson
item.itunes:keywords: engineering, software engineering, software development, open source

item.itunes:title: 17: Request for Comment #3
item.title: 17: Request for Comment #3
item.description: Anna Carey, Jon Allured, and Steve Hicks hang out and talk about what they're working, what excites them, and the challenges and rewards of 3rd-party integration.
item.content:encoded: Anna Carey, Jon Allured, and Steve Hicks hang out and talk about what they're working, what excites them, and the challenges and rewards of 3rd-party integration.
item.itunes:author: Anna Carey, Jon Allured, & Steve Hicks
item.itunes:keywords: engineering, software engineering, software development, open source
